comments:
Description:
NPE when insert data to grid which shares other's result set.
Build number:2.2.1.v200708170934

Steps to reproduce:
1. New data source and dataset.
2. Drag a column to Layout, name it "data1".
3. Insert a grid.
4. In Property Editor->advanced, input "data1" in Data binding reference property.
5. Insert a data item to grid cell.

Expected result:
Pop up Binding dialog for binding.

Actual result:
NPE in Errors log and no binding dialog pops up.

Error log:
org.eclipse.swt.SWTException: Failed to execute runnable (java.lang.NullPointerException)
